rule_text: A modifier is a number that is applied by an ability to increase or decrease the attribute values of a unit or the results of a die roll.   47.1 A modifier is always preceded by the word 'apply' followed by a numerical value.   47. 2 A modifier value preceded by a '+' is added to the attribute or result being modified; a modifier value preceded by a '-' is subtracted from the attribute or result being modified.
